DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare effect Welchol combination TriCor compare TriCor alone low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) patient high cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Welchol TriCor TriCor Alone Patients With High Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: 3070 year age History mixed hyperlipidemia Prescribed Step 1 diet least 30 day prior screen Women pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant study Women hysterectomy tubal ligation , postmenopausal , practice reliable birth control procedures Serum LDLC > /= 115 mg/dL ; Serum TG > /= 150 & < 750 mg/dL BMI > 40 HbA1C > 10 % Type 1 diabetes Intolerance fibrates History intolerance colesevelam HCl History swallow disorder intestinal motility disorder Any disorder might interfere conduct study History drug alcohol abuse Recent ( within 28 day ) history cardiac disease ( MI , CHF , CABG , etc . )
